sqlGroup.name: enterprise
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E_USER WHERE UPPER(C_USER) = ? AND UPPER(C_PASSWD) = ? AND R_SID = ?
SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E WHERE UPPER(C_CODE)=?

sqlGroup.name: navgate
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_NAV ORDER BY R_SID, N_INDEX
SELECT * FROM SYS_NAV WHERE R_SID=(SELECT SID FROM SYS_NAV WHERE R_SID = ?)

sqlGroup.name: profession
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT B.* FROM SYS_TENANT_E_PROFESSION A INNER JOIN SYS_PROFESSION B ON A.P_PROFESSION = B.SID WHERE A.R_TENANT = ?
SELECT A.SID ID, A.C_NAME NAME, B.SID PROID, B.C_NAME PRONAME, B.R_TEMPLATE TMPID FROM SYS_INDUSTRY A LEFT JOIN SYS_PROFESSION B ON A.SID = B.R_INDUSTRY

sqlGroup.name: template
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT A.* FROM SYS_TEMPLATE A INNER JOIN SYS_PROFESSION B ON A.SID=B.R_TEMPLATE WHERE B.SID=?

sqlGroup.name: templateFolder
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_STDTMP_FOLDER WHERE R_TEMPLATE = ? ORDER BY N_INDEX, T_CREATE

sqlGroup.name: templateFile
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_STDTMP_FILE WHERE R_SID=?
SELECT * FROM SYS_STDTMP_FILE WHERE R_TEMPLATE=? ORDER BY N_INDEX, T_CREATE

sqlGroup.name: attachText
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_ATTACH_TEXT WHERE R_TABLE=? and R_FIELD=? and R_SID=? and R_TENANT=? and P_TENANT=?

sqlGroup.name: attachFile
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_ATTACH_FILE WHERE R_TABLE=? and R_SID=? and R_TENANT=? and P_TENANT=?

sqlGroup.name: enterpriseProfession
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E_PROFESSION WHERE R_TENANT=?
SELECT * FROM SYS_TENANT_E_PROFESSION WHERE R_TENANT=? and P_PROFESSION=?

sqlGroup.name: enterpriseUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT A.* FROM SYS_TENANT_E_USER A INNER JOIN SYS_TENANT_E B ON A.R_SID = B.SID WHERE IFNULL(A.B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND IFNULL(B.B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND UPPER(B.C_CODE)=? AND UPPER(A.C_USER)=? AND UPPER(A.C_PASSWD)=?

sqlGroup.name: governmentUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT A.* FROM SYS_TENANT_G_USER A INNER JOIN SYS_TENANT_G B ON A.R_SID = B.SID WHERE IFNULL(A.B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND IFNULL(B.B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND UPPER(B.C_CODE)=? AND UPPER(A.C_USER)=? AND UPPER(A.C_PASSWD)=?

sqlGroup.name: reviewUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT A.* FROM SYS_TENANT_R_USER A INNER JOIN SYS_TENANT_R B ON A.R_SID = B.SID WHERE IFNULL(A.B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND IFNULL(B.B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND UPPER(B.C_CODE)=? AND UPPER(A.C_USER)=? AND UPPER(A.C_PASSWD)=?

sqlGroup.name: systemUser
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_USER WHERE IFNULL(B_DELETE, 0)=0 AND UPPER(C_NAME)=? and UPPER(C_PASSWD)=?

sqlGroup.name: passwordResetHistory
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_HIS_PWDRESET WHERE DATE_ADD(T_APPLY,INTERVAL 1 HOUR) >= NOW() AND IFNULL(N_STATE, 0)=0 AND C_EMAIL=?
SELECT * FROM SYS_HIS_PWDRESET WHERE DATE_ADD(T_APPLY,INTERVAL 1 HOUR) >= NOW() AND IFNULL(N_STATE, 0)=0 AND C_TOKEN=?
